response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us at $1,200,000, but considering its importance to you, we aim to make it accessible while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. We propose to offer this remarkable product to you at $950,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing our return and providing you with an excellent value proposition. We believe this offer presents an attractive deal for both sides and look forward to discussing further details with you.", "product_price": 950000}
